Welcome to my site! So a little about me on how I became the myth, the legend, the man, It all started in 1980 born in a revolution that we had to flee traveled to Italy From there we came to the USA were I've been raised. I grew up in California where I learned the values of Family and Friends who without them today I would not be the myth, the legend, the man.

Checkout the links above to get to know more about me.


Loyal to the very end
Always wants to be your bestfriend
Never want you to be alone
Will even give you my last bone
First one to greet you when you come home
Always sad when I see you go
Always glad for you to be around
When your gone I have a little meltdown
Howling cause I miss you
I didn't mean to chew your shoes
Even when I get caught I know
You can't stay mad at me for much to long
I'm sorry I did something wrong
I'll always be by your side
Everyday until I die
Loyal to the very end
Because you and I will always be bestfriends

Daily Thought

03-14-2016

My daily thought! Have we gone back as a nation? As technology has developed, we see more and more crime, violence, and hatred on T.V and the web than ever before. What happen to us as a "Nation United". The term "Nation United" is one of the most patriotic gestures...
